data.Name: Document Information
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Accounting Entries Specified XBRLGL_ Document Information
data.Description: Parent for descriptive information about the accountingEntries section in which it is contained.

data.Name: Entity Information
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Accounting Entries Specified XBRLGL_ Entity Information
data.Description: Holder for entity information - information about the reporting organization.

data.Name: Entry Header
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Accounting Entries Specified XBRLGL_ Entry Header
data.Description: Parent for entry headers/journal entry headers.

data.Name: Entries Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Entries Type Code
data.Description: account: information to fill in a chart of accounts file balance: the results of accumulation of a complete and validated list of entries for an account or a list of account in a specific period - sometimes called general ledger entries: a list of individual accounting entries, which might be posted/validated or nonposted/n journal: a self-balancing Dr= Cr list of entries for a specific period including beginning balance for that period ledger: a complete list of entries for a specific account or list of accounts for a specific period; note - debits do not have to equal credits assets: a listing of open receivables, payables, inventory, fixed assets or other information that can be extracted from but are not necessarily included as part of a journal n trialBalance: the self-balancing Dr= Cr result of accumulation of a complete and validated list of entries for the entity in a complete list of accounts in a specific period taxtables: aids automated interpretation of instances that represent tax tables; Tax table are defined by using multiple [taxes] structures to gather the population of codes, authorities and rates; through [taxTableCode] cross-references in the [taxes] structure, these 'master file' tax tables can be referenced mapping: a collection of mappings between interrelated data sets, such as a local and related corporate standard chart of accounts or detail data mapped to summarized end reporting concepts versioning: a collection of changes between two versions of the same class of information, such as updates to a master file like a chart of accounts master_file: a collection of master files, such as the customer or inventory master file trade_documents: a collection of trade/transactional documents, such as vendor invoices or customer orders profile_compliant: the meaning of this collection of information can be determined by understanding an established profile and especially an XBRL GL Profile Profiles are determined through namespace declarations, schemaRef and conventions of those profiles other: for all other types of representations Often sorted by date or by account, these terms have specific, and sometimes different, meanings in different areas Common practice will drive accounting method/term matches.

data.Name: Unique ID
data.Description: Unique identifier for this file.

data.Name: Reverse Unique ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Reverse Unique ID
data.Description: Internal ID Number associated with identifierReference

data.Name: Reverse Unique ID Action Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Reverse Unique ID Action Code
data.Description: Provides guidance on action to take with previous set of data: supersedes - old data should be considered as obsolete/overwritten; supplements - belongs with that data as if it was included with it.

data.Name: Language Code
data.Description: Primary language of the intellectual content Where practical, the content of this field should coincide with ISO 639-1988 language codes.

data.Name: Creation Date
data.Description: Date/time file was created.

data.Name: Creator
data.Description: Identifies the creator of the XBRL instance.

data.Name: Entries Comment
data.Description: Text for entire document.

data.Name: Period Covered Start Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Period Covered Start Date Time
data.Description: Start of date range for contents Used as basis for many assumptions about data, including the date as of which open balances are open.

data.Name: Period Covered End Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Period Covered End Date Time
data.Description: End of date range for contents Used as basis for many assumptions about data, including the date as of which open balances are open.

data.Name: Period Count Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Period Count Numeric
data.Description: Number of periods or buckets, used by postingCode Used to interpret posting date It may be preferable to limit entries by period covered to be by individual reporting period.

data.Name: Period Unit Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Period Unit Code
data.Description: Type of periods covered by periodCount Enumerated as: daily, weekly, bi-weekly, semi-monthly, monthly, quarterly, thirdly, semiannual, annual, ad-hoc, current-period-only, other.

data.Name: Period Unit Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Period Unit Description
data.Description: Free format description of the period unit

data.Name: Source Application
data.Description: Product or service that produced this file Used by many systems e.g., VAT Version number can be included or extended.

data.Name: Target Application
data.Description: Particular use for which file was generated.

data.Name: Default Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Information Default Currency Code
data.Description: The default currency related to the amount can be entered here instead of the XBRL instance specified way, especially important in multi-currency situations Recommend ISO 4217 coding

data.Name: Organization Accounting Method Purpose Default Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Organization Accounting Method Purpose Default Code
data.Description: If not stated explicitly at the line level, the default reporting purpose - from book, tax, management, statutory, other

data.Name: Organization Accounting Method Purpose Default Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Organization Accounting Method Purpose Default Description
data.Description: Free format description of the default accounting method purpose
data.PropertyTerm: Organization Accounting Method Purpose Default Description

data.Name: Business description
data.Description: Description of the nature of the business of the entity.

data.Name: Fiscal Year Start Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Fiscal Year Start Date
data.Description: Start of fiscal year Where appropriate, corporate year period representation permits non-365 or 366 day years more appropriate for internal sharing than data from external sources In Europe, some jurisdictions allow 2 year minus 1 day fiscal years.

data.Name: Fiscal Yesr End Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Fiscal Yesr End Date
data.Description: End of fiscal year Where appropriate, corporate year period representation permits non-365 or 366 day years more appropriate for internal sharing than data from external sources In Europe, some jurisdictions allow 2 year minus 1 day fiscal years.

data.Name: Organization Identifier
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Organization Identifier
data.Description: Section which contains various identifiers for the company.

data.Name: Web Site
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Web Site
data.Description: Primary web site of the entity.

data.Name: Phone
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Phone
data.Description: Primary phone number of the entity.

data.Name: Fax
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Fax
data.Description: Tuple for holding company fax information.

data.Name: Email
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Email
data.Description: Tuple for holding company email information.

data.Name: Address
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Organization XBRLGL_ Address
data.Description: Address structure for the reporting entity

data.Name: Contact
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Contact
data.Description: Information about contacts.

data.Name: Accountant
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Accountant
data.Description: Information about the relevant external accountant

data.Name: Organization Accounting Method
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method
data.Description: Section for identifying the methods of accounting used by the entity for different reporting purposes

data.Name: Reporting Calendar
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entity Information Specified XBRLGL_ Reporting Calendar
data.Description: A tool to collect the periods used to summarise results from transactions.

data.Name: Identifier
data.Description: Code representing the company or organization whose data this file represents: used for situations where one user e.g., a CPA needs to keep track of multiple organizations' files e.g., multiple clients Can be EIN#, client #, internal/external identifier, SIC code Codes which identifies the entity Includes the code identifier of the authority issuing the code, a colon, and the code itself For example, CIK:01234567 for the CIK number issued by SEC EDGAR.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Text for organization identified by organizationIdentifier Any descriptive information about the code.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Description of the web site.

data.Name: URL Code
data.Description: Valid URL of the web site Should be full URL.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Phone number referred to in 'phoneNumberDescription'

data.Name: Number
data.Description: Entity Phone Number Description such as Main, Investor relations Enumerated as: bookkeeper, controller, direct, fax, investor-relations, main, switchboard, other.

data.Name: Usage
data.Description: Company fax number usage e.g orders, head office, IR

data.Name: Number
data.Description: Company Fax Number

data.Name: Usage
data.Description: Company email address usage e.g orders, head office, IR

data.Name: Address
data.Description: Company Email Address

data.Name: Name
data.Description: Name of organization used at this address

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Description of the address, such as Mailing, Physical, Investor Relations, etc.

data.Name: Purpose
data.Description: Freeform for codes like shipping, billing, mailing at address level Allows identification of multiple purpose addresses for each address of the reporting organization.

data.Name: LocationIdentifier
data.Description: A code used to identify the location and to associate it with contacts and transactions

data.Name: Building Number
data.Description: Building Number

data.Name: Street
data.Description: Street address

data.Name: Street2
data.Description: Address Detail

data.Name: City
data.Description: City or town of the address.

data.Name: State Or Province
data.Description: State, province or region of the address.

data.Name: Zip Or PostalCode
data.Description: Zip or other postal code of the address.

data.Name: Country
data.Description: Country of the address.

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the address is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Prefix
data.Description: Prefix e.g Dr., Mr., Mrs.

data.Name: Last Name
data.Description: Last or family name

data.Name: First Name
data.Description: First or given name

data.Name: Suffix
data.Description: Suffix e.g MD, CPA, Jr.

data.Name: Attention Line
data.Description: Attention Line

data.Name: Position Role
data.Description: Position or role

data.Name: Contact Type
data.Description: Role of contact Examples include: Source Service, Sender, Recipient, Invoicer, Auditor, Accountant

data.Name: Contact Location Identifier Cross Reference
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Contact Contact Location Identifier Cross Reference
data.Description: This code is used to associate the contact with a specific location for the Entity Its value should be the same as that of the organizationAddressLocationIdentifier

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the contact is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Phone
data.Description: Contact Phone Number

data.Name: Fax
data.Description: Contact Fax Number Structure

data.Name: Email
data.Description: Contact E-mail address structure

data.Name: Name
data.Description: Name of the accountant

data.Name: Engagement Type Code
data.Description: Type of engagement being performed by external accountant Enumerated as: audit, review, compilation, tax, other.

data.Name: Engagement Type Description
data.Description: Free format description of the type of engagement

data.Name: Address
data.Description: Section which contains accountant address information.

data.Name: Contact
data.Description: Accountant contact information structure

data.Name: Method Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Method Code
data.Description: For this entity, the method of accounting represented - from: accrual, cash, modified cash, modified accrual, encumbrance, special methods, hybrid methods, other

data.Name: Method Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Method Description
data.Description: Free format description of the accounting method

data.Name: Purpose Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Purpose Code
data.Description: For this entity, the reporting purpose represented - from book, tax, management, statutory, other

data.Name: Purpose Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Purpose Description
data.Description: Free format description of the accounting method purpose

data.Name: Method Start Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Method Start Date
data.Description: Accounting Method Start Date

data.Name: Method End Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Organization Accounting Method Method End Date
data.Description: Accounting Method End Date

data.Name: Code
data.Description: The code used to identify this specific reporting calendar, unique across periods

data.Name: Description
data.Description: A description of the reporting calendar associated with the reportingCalendarCode given

data.Name: Title
data.Description: A description of the reporting period The actual beginning and ending dates are found within the 'reportingCalendarPeriod' structure

data.Name: Period Code
data.Description: A tool to collect a specific set of periods used to summarize results from transactions.

data.Name: Period Type Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Reporting Calendar Period Type Description
data.Description: A description of the type of period involved.

data.Name: Open Closed Status Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Reporting Calendar Open Closed Status Code
data.Description: An identifier on whether the reporting calendar is still open for activity enumerated, 'open', 'closed', 'pending'

data.Name: Purpose Code
data.Description: A description of the accounting set of books involved Uses enumeration from accounting method purpose.

data.Name: Purpose Description
data.Description: Free format description of the reporting purpose

data.Name: Period Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Reporting Calendar Specified XBRLGL_ Period Type
data.Description: A code for the type of period involved Enumerated as: monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, 4-5-4, ad-hoc, other.

data.Name: Identifier
data.Description: An identifier for this period in this calendar

data.Name: Description
data.Description: A description of this specific reporting period in this calendar.

data.Name: Start Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Period Type Start Date Time
data.Description: The beginning date/time of a period

data.Name: End Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Period Type End Date Time
data.Description: The ending date/time of a period

data.Name: Closed Date
data.Description: The date/time a period has been closed for activity If this is present with a nill value xsi:nill='true' then the period is not closed.

data.Name: Posted Date
data.Description: Date this entry was posted validated to the general ledger May not represent the date of accounting significance which is represented by 'postingDate'.

data.Name: Entered By
data.Description: Initials/name of operator originally entering.

data.Name: Entered By Modified
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Entered By Modified
data.Description: Identification for the last person modifying this entry before posting.

data.Name: Entered Date
data.Description: Represents the actual date/time of entry into computer automated from system date, often misrepresented by changing system clock Posting dates are maintained separately

data.Name: Entry Responsible Person
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Entry Responsible Person
data.Description: Identifier of person who created or originated or is otherwise responsible for the entry.

data.Name: Source Journal ID Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Source Journal ID Code
data.Description: Source journal The code of the journal in which the entry is processed The code must be a unique indication for a journal and is selected from the following enumerated list: cd cash disbursements sending cheques to vendors cr cash receipts receiving cheques from others fa fixed assets gi giro/other bank adjustments gj general journal im inventory management jc job cost pj purchase journal liabilities from purchases pl payroll journal sj sales journal se standard entries ud user defined ot other sources of entries

data.Name: Source Journal Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Source Journal Description
data.Description: Source journal full description of general journal, payroll journal, accountant entries A more easily readable journal indication The most common journals are: Purchases, Sales, Cash, and General Journal.

data.Name: Entry Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Entry Type Code
data.Description: One of the following enumerated list: adjusting, budget, comparative, external-accountant, standard, passed-adjusting, eliminating, proposed, recurring, reclassifying, simulated, tax, other

data.Name: Entry Origin
data.Description: Origin of entry: accrual, manual entry, imported entry, exchange gain or loss

data.Name: Entry Number
data.Description: Identifier within source journal

data.Name: Entry Comment
data.Description: Description of entry described by this entry header e.g Opening Balance

data.Name: Qualifier Entry Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Qualifier Entry Code
data.Description: Entry Qualifier - An enumerated field that qualifies the type of entry, specifically useful for general ledger and trial balance environments when it is important to state the values represented are summarized as of the reporting date - opening or closing balances In accounting systems, this is often known as BBF balance brought forward Permitted values are: standard, balance-brought-forward and other.

data.Name: Qualifier Entry Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Qualifier Entry Description
data.Description: Free format description of the entry qualifier

data.Name: Posting Code
data.Description: Code for posting to period, e.g., period 1-13, based on codes in an accounting period file We do not recommend that software vendors export here, but suggest providing period end numbers for the buckets Possibilities W1 through W53, M1 through M13, Q1-Q4 Developers and others creating output files are encouraged to supply an actual end date.

data.Name: Batch ID
data.Description: ID for a batch for this group of entries

data.Name: Batch Description
data.Description: Description of this batch

data.Name: Number Of Entries Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Number Of Entries Numeric
data.Description: The total number of entries.

data.Name: Total Debit Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Total Debit Amount
data.Description: The total of all debit amounts.

data.Name: TotalCredit Amount
data.Description: The total of all credit amounts.

data.Name: Book Tax Difference Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Book Tax Difference Code
data.Description: Enumerated field with possible values of permanent, temporary or none indicating the type of difference between book and tax accounting methods Omission of this field is equivalent to 'none'

data.Name: Elimination Code
data.Description: Informs destination ledger this is an intracompany entry which eliminates in consolidation

data.Name: Budget Scenario Period Start Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Budget Scenario Period Start Date
data.Description: Start of period covered by associated budgetScenario

data.Name: Budget Scenario Period End Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Budget Scenario Period End Date
data.Description: End of period covered by associated budgetScenario

data.Name: Budget Scenario Text
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Budget Scenario Text
data.Description: Text related to budgetScenario

data.Name: Budget Scenario
data.Description: Code for a budget scenario identifier such as PB for 'preliminary budget', or RB for 'revised budget', or other identifier for entryType

data.Name: Budget Allocation Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Budget Allocation Code
data.Description: Code associated with the calculation formula: e.g Divide by number of periods, Total for period given

data.Name: Reversing Standard ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Reversing Standard ID
data.Description: For standard, reversing, master, cancelling or other entries an ID associated with those entries.

data.Name: Recurring Standard Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Recurring Standard Description
data.Description: Description to accompany standard or recurring ID

data.Name: Frequency Interval Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Frequency Interval Numeric
data.Description: For standard or recurring journals, how often entry may be made: every frequencyInterval frequencyUnit, such as every 7 interval days unit or every 1 interval quarter unit This field represents the interval.

data.Name: Frequency Unit
data.Description: For standard or recurring journals, how often entry may be made: every frequencyInterval frequencyUnit, such as every 7 interval days unit or every 1 interval quarter unit This field represents the unit.

data.Name: Repetitions Remaining Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Repetitions Remaining Numeric
data.Description: Number of times that the recurring entry will repeat

data.Name: Next Date repeat Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Next Date repeat Date Time
data.Description: Date next repeated or standard posted

data.Name: Last Date repeat Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Last Date repeat Date Time
data.Description: Date last repeated or standard posted

data.Name: End Date Repeating Entry Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header End Date Repeating Entry Date Time
data.Description: For standard or recurring journals, stop date/time for repetitive entry.

data.Name: Reverse Indicator
data.Description: Should entry be reversed?

data.Name: Reversing Date
data.Description: Date this entry should be reversed

data.Name: Entry Number Counter Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Entry Number Counter Numeric
data.Description: Unique reference for the entry - a numeric counter

data.Name: Entry Detail
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Header Specified XBRLGL_ Entry Detail
data.Description: Parent for entry detail

data.Name: Line Number
data.Description: Identifier for a particular entry detail

data.Name: Line Number Counter Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Line Number Counter Numeric
data.Description: Unique reference for the line - a numeric counter

data.Name: Sign Of Amount Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Sign Of Amount Code
data.Description: Sign of amount; provides 4 possible fields only when used in conjunction with debitCreditCode; primarily used for correcting entries so total debits and credits after an entry error are not inflated D + increase DebitsD - decrease debitsC + decreases creditC - increases credit

data.Name: Debit Credit Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Debit Credit Code
data.Description: Optional identifier of whether the amount is a Debit, a Credit or Undefined

data.Name: Posting Date
data.Description: At the detail level, this represents the accounting significance date No matter what date the document is received, entered, or posted, this signifies the accounting date of the entry If you want to see the financial results for March 5, 2002 and this entry is given that date, the entry will be part of the results for March 5, 2002 This is different from the postedDate found at the entryHeader level If you want the accounting significance to be a particular date, it goes here A single entry could represent multiple dates, but would only be posted on one date.

data.Name: Amount Memo
data.Description: A boolean like entry that indicates whether an entryDetail line has been provided solely to provide additional details and that tools should not consider the amount in postings.

data.Name: Allocation Code
data.Description: A code that is tied to the Enterprise's allocation system.

data.Name: Payment Method
data.Description: Method used or to be used to make the payment

data.Name: Posting Status Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Posting Status Code
data.Description: deferred: although entered, it cannot be posted until a later time posted: already posted proposed: a proposed item that must be approved simulated: a simulated item, for what-if tax: a tax-specific entry unposted:entered but not yet posted or validated cancelled:entered and later cancelled other:other status - should be described in postingStatusDescription

data.Name: Posting Status Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Posting Status Description
data.Description: Free format description of the posting status

data.Name: Detail Comment
data.Description: Description of this line of detail only

data.Name: Date Acknowledged Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Date Acknowledged Date Time
data.Description: Date of acknowledgement of goods/services shipped/received.

data.Name: Confirmed Date
data.Description: Date of confirmation of shipment/receipt.

data.Name: Ship From
data.Description: References organizationAddressLocationIdentifier where used Otherwise freeform.

data.Name: Ship Received Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Ship Received Date
data.Description: Date goods/services are shipped/received.

data.Name: Maturity Date
data.Description: Due date or other maturity date.

data.Name: Terms
data.Description: Discount/payment terms.

data.Name: Ticking Field Indicator
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Ticking Field Indicator
data.Description: Signifies that an item has been cleared, finished, finalized When checking accounts are called for, the tick or letter showing this was done appears in this field Can also be used for identifying that the original document against which a payment or DR/CR memo applies has been reconciled.

data.Name: Document Remaining Balance Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Document Remaining Balance Amount
data.Description: Balance remaining on the document

data.Name: Unique Consignment Reference
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Unique Consignment Reference
data.Description: Unique Consignment Reference or UCR An 'origin to destination' reference code for international consignments, developed in cooperation with the World Customs Organization and EAN International EAN http://www.wcoomd.org/ie/EN/press/UCR_new_e.pdf

data.Name: Account
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Account
data.Description: Tuple: parent container for account numbers and identifiers No entry is made here, but each detail line may have multiple accounts assigned to it for reporting in different GAAPs, offsetting accounts in Japan, passing along information to consolidation systems about local versus consolidating accounts, etc For example, the account 4783HG-QOWI-192837-1000 may be expressed so: /account/accountMainID 1000 /account/accountMainDescription Cash /account/accountSub/accountSubID 4783HG /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Department /account/accountSub/accountSubID QOWI /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Branch /account/accountSub/accountSubID 192837 /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Division

data.Name: Monetary Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Monetary Amount
data.Description: This field amount represents the primary monetary amount related to the subject of the entryDetail line There is one primary monetary amount per entryDetail structure It may, for example, represent the amount of one line of a journal entry, the balance on a document, or the extended amount of a line item on an invoice Amount is not required if detailed entry is used for non-financial work and other elements are populated, in particular measurableQuantity The amount field is a signed number either positive or negative itself and used in conjunction with a separate signOfAmount and a separate debitCreditCode, which together are considered for understanding the monetary amount The unit of measure is determined by amountCurrency if present, and by the default or home currency if amountCurrency is not present.

data.Name: Identifier Reference
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference
data.Description: Identification for customer, vendor, or employee.

data.Name: Document
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Document

data.Name: Measureable
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Measureable
data.Description: Parent for information regarding measurable items associated with the enclosing entryDetail line Primary area used for holding performance measures Based on needs for tracking inventory transactional detail, but suitable for anything assigned to an 'account', 'reporting bucket' or 'code' Can be used to track any movements.

data.Name: Enhanced Measurable
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Enhanced Measurable
data.Description: An enumerated code to identify the inventory, fixed asset or other measurable class Enumerated as: raw material, work-in-process, finished goods, assemblies, supplies, land, building, machinery, furniture, vehicles, other.

data.Name: Job
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Job
data.Description: Tuple for holding job related information, separate from jobs represented in account identifier Would probably only have one jobinfo tuple for each entry line, but there may be a need to express more than one.

data.Name: Depreciation Mortgage
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Depreciation Mortgage
data.Description: Parent for information related to depreciation, mortgages, etc.

data.Name: Taxes
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Taxes
data.Description: Tuple for holding tax related information

data.Name: Originating Document
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Detail Specified XBRLGL_ Originating Document
data.Description: A tool to capture the flow of related documents in the business process Some needs of end users require a greater history of the documents that are associated with a transaction, especially in the VAT audit area Contains a repetitive structure of related documents.

data.Name: ID
data.Description: Main account - the code used to identify the accounting bucket the entry has been assigned to Examples might be 1000 for Cash, 567GAAZ for Sales Expense or Z for tax payments Identifiers such as department, branch, division, manager, or other modifiers are noted in the Subaccount area Before needing to post, account is not necessary Posting to the general ledger almost always requires an entry here.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Description of accountMainID - the human readable describer that accompanies the code used in accountMainID

data.Name: Main Account Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Account Main Account Type Code
data.Description: Account type - FASB Concepts 6 and similar international designs When xbrlInfo is used to associated other XBRL reporting items, this field is more suited to representing existing systems audit than data interchange Enumerated as: asset, liability, equity, income, gain, expense, loss, contr-to-equity, distr-from-equity, comprehensive-income, other.

data.Name: Main Account Type Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Account Main Account Type Description
data.Description: Free format description of the account classification

data.Name: Main Account
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Account Parent XBRLGL_ Main Account
data.Description: Roll up item from child natural account to parent natural account.

data.Name: Purpose Code
data.Description: Code related to usage for account aggregate - Consolidating, European, IFRS, Offsetting, Primary, Tax, USGAAP, Japanese, Other Japanese companies will use this for the tax required offsetting entry If left blank, assumes default accounting method for company.

data.Name: Purpose Description
data.Description: Description of usage for aggregate account

data.Name: Type Code
data.Description: Type of account Enumerated as: account, bank, employee, customer, job, vendor, measurable, statistical, other.

data.Name: Type Description
data.Description: Free format description of the account type

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the account is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Entry Accounting Method
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Account Specified token XBRLGL_ Entry Accounting Method
data.Description: For this entry, the method of accounting represented - from: accrual, cash, modified cash, modified accrual, encumbrance, special methods, hybrid methods, other

data.Name: Sub Account
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Account Specified XBRLGL_ Sub Account
data.Description: Tuple to hold multiple accountSubIDs and Descriptions

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Free format description of the entry accounting method

data.Name: Purpose Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Accounting Method Purpose Code
data.Description: For this entry, the reporting purpose represented - from book, tax, management, statutory, other

data.Name: Purpose Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Entry Accounting Method Purpose Description
data.Description: Free format description of the entry accounting method purpose

data.Name: Description
data.Description: The description that accompanies accountSubID belongs here.

data.Name: ID
data.Description: Where the primary account was placed in accountMainID, the code used for each profit center, division, business unit, fund, program, branch, project, class, su-class or other modifier is placed here.

data.Name: Type Code
data.Description: Type of sub-account - profit center, division, business unit, fund, program, branch, project, class, su-class or other modifier is placed here For example: Accountability center: Business unit: Class:Department: Project: Fund: Program:Job: Profit center: Branch: Setup class: Division: Unit

data.Name: Segment Parent
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Sub Account Specified XBRLGL_ Segment Parent
data.Description: Tuple for showing the detail necessary to roll up from one segment type of subaccount to another.

data.Name: Type
data.Description: The describer of the segment this subaccount rolls up to.

data.Name: Reporting Tree Identifier
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Segment Parent Reporting Tree Identifier
data.Description: Used for representing descriptions of reporting trees.

data.Name: Proportion Numeric
data.Description: For partial allocations of amounts to different parents, the percentage of a child that will be allocated to a parent.

data.Name: Sub Account
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Segment Parent Parent XBRLGL_ Sub Account
data.Description: Subaccount NUMBER this subaccount rolls up to - see also subaccount type it rolls up to.

data.Name: Amount
data.Description: This field amount represents the primary monetary amount related to the subject of the entryDetail line There is one primary monetary amount per entryDetail structure It may, for example, represent the amount of one line of a journal entry, the balance on a document, or the extended amount of a line item on an invoice Amount is not required if detailed entry is used for non-financial work and other elements are populated, in particular measurableQuantity The amount field is a signed number either positive or negative itself and used in conjunction with a separate signOfAmount and a separate debitCreditCode, which together are considered for understanding the monetary amount The unit of measure is determined by amountCurrency if present, and by the default or home currency if amountCurrency is not present.

data.Name: Multi Currency
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Monetary Amount Specified Codee XBRLGL_ Multi Currency
data.Description: The currency related to the amount can be entered here instead of the XBRL instance specified way, especially important in multi-currency situations Recommend ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: Currency Code
data.Description: The currency related to the amount can be entered here instead of the XBRL instance specified way, especially important in multi-currency situations Recommend ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Amount
data.Description: Amount in original as opposed to home currency, for multi-currency tracking

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Currency Code
data.Description: The currency used to track original, as opposed to home, amounts Recommended ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate at time of original transaction expressed as national currency divided by original currency

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Date
data.Description: Date of exchange rate used to record the original transaction.

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Comment
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Orignal_ Exchange Rate Comment
data.Description: Comment about exchange rate used for recording original transaction.

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Triangulation_ Amount
data.Description: If triangulation is used, amount in triangulation currency, for multi-currency tracking Debit is entered as positive, credit as negative.

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Amount Triangulation_ Currency Code
data.Description: The currency used for triangulation, if used May often be EUR or USD Recommended ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: National Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency National Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate between national currency and triangulation currency at time of original transaction expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: National Triangulation_ Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency National Triangulation_ Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount at time of original transaction - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: National Triangulation_ Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency National Triangulation_ Type
data.Description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount at time of original transaction - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Original Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Original Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate between original currency and triangulation currency at time of original transaction expressed as original currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: Original Triangulation_ Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Original Triangulation_ Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation from original currency to triangulation currency at time of original transaction - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Original Triangulation_ Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Original Triangulation_ Type
data.Description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation from original currency to triangulation currency at time of original transaction - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Multi Currency Detail
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Specified XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail
data.Description: Section to provide additional information related to home currencies that differ from original currencies and related exchange rates - typically this will be used to record exchange rates and amounts in currencies and/or on dates other than those of the original transaction This structure allows recording of exchange rates using a third currency as a triangulation currency This is often EUR but is not restricted to being so This structure may be repeated as many times as necessary to record amounts in foreign currencies on the same or different dates.

data.Name: Exchange Rate Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Exchange Rate Date
data.Description: Date of exchange rate other than original transaction date on which amount is expressed as amountRestatedAmount or amountTriangulationAmount

data.Name: Amount Restated_ Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Restated_ Amount
data.Description: The amount in the foreign currency identified by amountRestatedCurrency as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate.

data.Name: Amount Restated_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Restated_ Currency Code
data.Description: The currency in which amountRestatedAmount is expressed Recommended ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate used to convert amountRestatedAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency

data.Name: Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate for restated amount - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Restated_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: Type of Exchange Rate for restated amount - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Triangulation_ Amount
data.Description: The amount in the triangulation currency identified by amountTriangulationCurrency as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate.

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Triangulation_ Currency Code
data.Description: The currency used for tringulation between amountRestatedCurrency and the home currency Recommended ISO 4217 coding.

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate used to convert amountTriangulationAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Amount Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: Exchange rate used to convert from amountRestatedAmount to amountTriangulationAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate expressed as foreign currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: Source of Exchange Rate for converting between foreign currency and triangulation currency - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Restated Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: Type of Exchange Rate for converting between foreign currency and triangulation currency - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Detail Comment
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Multi Currency Detail Detail Comment
data.Description: Comment describing the enclosing multicurrencyDetail tuple's contents May include reason for recording additional exchange rates other than that used at the time of the original transaction.

data.Name: Identifier Code
data.Description: N/A

data.Name: Organization Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Organization Type Code
data.Description: Identifier Organization Type Enumerated as: individual, organization, other.

data.Name: Organization Type Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Organization Type Description
data.Description: Free format description of the identifier organization type

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Textual description of identifierReference.

data.Name: Type Code
data.Description: Entity type enumerated: C, customer, E, employee, V, vendor, O, other, I, salesperson-internal, X, salesperson-external, N, contractor.

data.Name: Category
data.Description: For use as Customer, Vendor or Employee Class such as Residential/Commercial/Institutional/Government or Retail/Wholesale or other classifications used by business.

data.Name: Purpose
data.Description: Freeform for codes like purchasing, billing, manufacturing at identifier level.

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the identifier is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Email
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Email
data.Description: Email address for Identifier.

data.Name: Phone
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Phone
data.Description: Phone number related to Identifier.

data.Name: Fax
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Fax
data.Description: Fax number structure related to identifier.

data.Name: Address
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Address
data.Description: Address block of customer, vendor, employee for integration purposes, VAT.

data.Name: Contact
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Contact
data.Description: Identifier Contact Structure

data.Name: Identifier External Reference
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier Reference Specified XBRLGL_ Identifier External Reference
data.Description: Structure containing references to an external authority associated with identifier

data.Name: Authority Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier External Reference Authority Code
data.Description: External Authority e,g, Tax Authority ID Number associated with identifierReference

data.Name: Authority
data.Description: Name of External Authority e.g Tax Authority

data.Name: Authority Verification Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Identifier External Reference Authority Verification Date
data.Description: Date on which the External Authority last performed a verification

data.Name: Type Code
data.Description: An enumerated field describing the original source document, with check, debit-memo, credit-memo, finance-charge, invoice, order-customer, order-vendor, payment-other, reminder, tegata, voucher, shipment, receipt, manual-adjustment, other.

data.Name: type Description
data.Description: Free format description of the document type

data.Name: Invoice Type Code
data.Description: Invoice Type self-billed, ePoS enumerated values

data.Name: Number
data.Description: Invoice, check, voucher, or other source document identifier

data.Name: Apply To Number Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Document Apply To Number Code
data.Description: Document number of primary invoice number, used to offset payments, debits and credits; for an invoice, usually the same as the documentNumber When calculating open balance on an invoice, or open amount on payments in advance or not fully applied, this permits calculation of the open item.

data.Name: Reference
data.Description: Internal reference for the document above; number assigned internally to track the document

data.Name: Date
data.Description: Date and less likely in the paper world but possible in the e-world, time on actual document invoice, voucher, check date Other dates control posting information.

data.Name: Received Date
data.Description: Date/time document was noted as received if necessary Represents actual date received Posting dates are maintained separately.

data.Name: Chargeable Reimbursable
data.Description: Is this entry chargeable to client, reimbursable? Used by some systems to indicate that account on posting/validation should be posted to a customer or vendor's account.

data.Name: Location
data.Description: Document location as URI, file name or other reference Alternatively, text of document can be placed here.

data.Name: Code
data.Description: Code for measurable item including BP - Business process, FA - Fixed asset/Capitalized item, IN - Inventory, KPI - Metric, NT - Intangible, SP - Supplies, SV-P - Service by employee, vendor or contractor, SV-M - Service by equipment/machinery, OT - Other

data.Name: Code Description
data.Description: Free format description of the measurable code

data.Name: Category
data.Description: Category of the measurable

data.Name: ID
data.Description: Internal inventory part or SKU number or other code identifier for the measurable.

data.Name: ID Schema
data.Description: URI or other identifier for schema with which measurable ID can be validated

data.Name: ID Other
data.Description: Second identifier such as vendor's item number

data.Name: ID Other Schema
data.Description: URI or other identifier for schema with which measurable ID Other can be validated

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Text description of measurable e.g inventory item or other identifier

data.Name: Quantity
data.Description: Number of units in this transaction; for non-monetary calculations; can be square footage, number of people, etc.

data.Name: Qualifier Code
data.Description: Field that can represent grading, inspection codes, ratings and other qualifiers to properly capture PKI/Balanced Scorecard information

data.Name: Unit Of Measure
data.Description: Description of unit: e.g each, case, dozen, etc ISO standard coding recommended.

data.Name: Cost Per Unit Amount
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Measureable Cost Per Unit Amount
data.Description: Per unit price of the measurable Although one might expect that measurableQuantity * measurableCostPerUnit= amount, this is not mandated except by external rules sets.

data.Name: Start Date Time
data.Description: Start time of the duration being measured

data.Name: End Date Time
data.Description: End time of the duration being measured

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the measurable is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Class ID Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Enhanced Measurable Class ID Code
data.Description: An enumerated code to identify the inventory, fixed asset or other measurable class Enumerated as: raw material, work-in-process, finished goods, assemblies, supplies, land, building, machinery, furniture, vehicles, other.

data.Name: Class Description
data.Description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:measurableClassID to provide specialization or clarification for the enumerated value of other.

data.Name: Costing Method Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Enhanced Measurable Costing Method Code
data.Description: An enumerated code for the inventory or other measurable costing method Enumerated as: LIFO, FIFO, average, weighted-average, standard-cost, tax-basis, book-basis, other.

data.Name: Costing Method Description
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Enhanced Measurable Costing Method Description
data.Description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:costingMethodCode to provide specialization of clarification for the enumerated value of other.

data.Name: Geospatial Coordinate
data.Description: Enter a relevant location for this item Format can be either: - Degrees, minutes, and seconds DMS: 4124'12.2 N 210'26.5 E - Degrees and decimal minutes DMM: 41 24.2028, 2 10.4418 - Decimal degrees DD: 41.40338, 2.17403

data.Name: Serial Lot
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Enhanced Measurable Specified XBRLGL_ Serial Lot
data.Description: Tuple for holding information about serial numbers or lots batches As a tuple, this permits multiple serial numbers or multiple lot number batches within a single gl-cor:measurable structure.

data.Name: Code
data.Description: Is this item tracked by serial numbers or lot numbers? A serial number is usually a unique number assigned to a single; a lot or batch number is provided when a batch of items is fungible but must be differentiated from similar items from other batches Enumerated indicator for serial or lot items Enumeration are: serial, lot, other, neither If not included within the tuple, neither is assumed.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:serialLotCode to provide specialization and especially to provide clarification for the enumerated value of other in serialLotCode Examples might be batch or group.

data.Name: Number
data.Description: The holder for that actual serial number or lot batch number/code assigned to an item or a batch of items.

data.Name: Next Serial Lot Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Next Serial Lot Number
data.Description: A field for holding the next expected serial or lot number to be given to future assignments, or for chaining between already assigned items.

data.Name: Quantity
data.Description: The quantity of units in this particular batch Unit of measure is the gl-bus:measurableUnitofMeasure.

data.Name: Original Quantity
data.Description: The quantity of units in this batch on inception.

data.Name: Remaining Quantity
data.Description: The remaining quantity of units from the original batch; may be the same as the quantity in this batch or include other batches from the same original batch.

data.Name: Origination Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Origination Date Time
data.Description: Date of manufacture or creation.

data.Name: Expiration Date Time
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Expiration Date Time
data.Description: Expiration date of the batch.

data.Name: Manufacturer
data.Description: Manufacturer of the item serial or items lot/batch.

data.Name: Batch Description
data.Description: A name or description of the items in the lot or batch.

data.Name: Warranty Start Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Warranty Start Date
data.Description: If the items are covered by warranty, when that warranty covered will begin or has begun.

data.Name: Warranty End Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Warranty End Date
data.Description: If the items are covered by warranty, when that warranty covered will end or ended.

data.Name: Warranty Period Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Warranty Period Numeric
data.Description: Warranty period - numeric portion; for a 30 day warranty period, the 30 would go here, and the day would go in gl-ehm:serialLotWarrantyPeriodUnit.

data.Name: Warranty Period Unit
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Serial Lot Warranty Period Unit
data.Description: Warrant period - time or cycle unit portion Values from the XBRL Unit Registry (www.xbrl.org/utr/utr.xml) are suggested where possible Examples might include: H (hours), D (days), M (months), Y (years), machine cycles, km (kilometers).

data.Name: Warranty Vendor
data.Description: The vendor providing warranty; this may differ from the manufacturer.

data.Name: Warranty Contract
data.Description: Contract or document information related to the warranty, such as a contract number and date or a URL with more information.

data.Name: Comment
data.Description: Free format text related to the serial number or lot.

data.Name: Code
data.Description: Associated job number or code This could be built into the account, but many systems maintain a separate job coding system Use primarily if job identification is a separate system, and not considered part of the chart of accounts.

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Description of job

data.Name: Phase Code
data.Description: Job code, phase, activity Allows greater granularity than a simple job number Although the core only reaches down from job to phases, this can be customized to extend down to cost codes.

data.Name: Phase description
data.Description: Description of Job code, phase, activity

data.Name: Active Indicator
data.Description: Boolean to indicate whether the job is active='true' or inactive='false'

data.Name: Jurisdiction Code
data.Description: Jurisdiction e.g federal, state, local: e.g US Federal, Province of Qubec, other identifier Enumerated as: F, federal, S, state, L, local, other.

data.Name: Method Type
data.Description: Type of depreciation method: used for information about the loan percentage for loan or the depreciation method This is used for informational purposes only Examples of entries are '20%', '5 year DDB' Double Declining Balance.

data.Name: Life Length Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Depreciation Mortgage Life Length Numeric
data.Description: Length of life in number of periods.

data.Name: Comment
data.Description: Description of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.

data.Name: Start Date
data.Description: Start of the applicable period of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.

data.Name: End Date
data.Description: End of the applicable period of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.

data.Name: Amount
data.Description: Amount of a cost or fee charged for a mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.

data.Name: Type Code
data.Description: Originating document type check, debit-memo, credit-memo, finance-charge, invoice, order-customer, order-vendor, payment-other, reminder, tegata, voucher, shipment, receipt, manual-adjustment, other.

data.Name: Number
data.Description: Originating document number

data.Name: Date
data.Description: Originating document date

data.Name: Identifier Type Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Originating Document Identifier Type Code
data.Description: Originating document identifier type Enumerated as: C, customer, E, employee, V, vendor, O, other, I, salesperson-internal, X, salesperson-external, N, contractor.

data.Name: Identifier Code
data.Description: Originating document identifier code

data.Name: Identifier Tax Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Originating Document Identifier Tax Code
data.Description: Originating document identifier tax code

data.Name: Authority
data.Description: Name of the relevant tax authority

data.Name: Table Code
data.Description: Tax table code used by the relevant tax authority

data.Name: Description
data.Description: Description of tax authority

data.Name: Amount
data.Description: Amount of taxes

data.Name: Basis Amount
data.Description: Basis for taxation

data.Name: Percentage Rate Numeric
data.Description: Percent rate for VAT or other taxes normally a number between 0 and 1.0 - e.g 50% is represented as 0.5

data.Name: Code
data.Description: A class or category of taxes

data.Name: Comment Exemption
data.Description: Additional text/code for exemption reasons or other comments.

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Amount
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the amount of tax in that currency

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Currency Code
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, that currency

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Date
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Date
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the date or date and time of the exchange rate used

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Comment
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Currency_ Exchange Rate Comment
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, comment about exchange rate used

data.Name: Triangulation Currency_ Amount
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the amount of that tax in the triangulation currency

data.Name: Triangulation Currency_ Currency Code
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Triangulation Currency_ Currency Code
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the triangulation currency

data.Name: Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Triangulation Currency_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.

data.Name: Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Numeric
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the exchange rate used expressed as foreign currency divided by triangulation currency

data.Name: Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Source
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg

data.Name: Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.DictionaryEntryName: XBRLGL_ Taxes Foreign Triangulation_ Exchange Rate Type
data.Description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
